name: ai-powered-content-moderation-web-app
description: AI-powered content moderation web application using OpenAI and Google Cloud Vision

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && npm test" "cd frontend && npm test"
